author: Scott Stump
title: CNN anchor Chris Cuomo says he lost 13 pounds in 3 days from coronavirus
description: The CNN anchor said he has also experienced headaches, high fever, blurry vision and extreme fatigue, with symptoms intensifying at night.
content:
Chris Cuomo wants people to know that getting coronavirus is "no cakewalk" for the majority of people who don't have to be hospitalized.
The television anchor told his CNN colleagues Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta on Thursday night that he has dropped … [+2160 chars]
